limit_orders.label: Import by n orders
limit_orders.comment: Limit number of orders imported. 10 by default

create_invoice.label: Create invoice ?
create_invoice.comment: If yes, an invoice will be created on ShoppingFlux's order creation

use_product_id.label: Use Product ID's instead of SKU ?
use_product_id.comment: Should be no in most cases.

use_marketplace_date.label: Use Marketplace Order Date and Time ?
use_marketplace_date.comment: If no, the order date will be the import date.

limit_address_length.label: Limit addresses length
limit_address_length.comment: Leave empty to not limit length. Minimum value if filled : 20

prefer_mobile_phone.label: Import mobile phone instead of desk phone, if available

default_method.label: Default shipping method
default_method.comment: Specific shipping method to use for imported ShoppingFlux's order

limit_hours.label: Max time before sending shipment update to marketplace
limit_hours.comment: In hours. If the shipment has still not any tracking number filled after X hours, the shipment is sent to the marketplace without tracking number.

filter_by_attribute.label: Export selected products only ?
filter_by_attribute.comment: If yes, you'll have to select products in Shoppingflux > Product Selection

default_shipping_delay.label: Shipping delay
default_shipping_delay.comment: Shipping delay, in days. This will be used if no shipping delay attribute is mapped.

default_shipping_method.label: Shipping Method
default_shipping_method.comment: Default shipping method to calculate shipping fees

try_use_real_shipping_price.label: Try to get real shipping fees for each product ?
try_use_real_shipping_price.comment: Disable this option if you have memory issues.

enable_not_salable_retention.label: Enable temporary retention of out of stock/not salable products

not_salable_retention_duration.label: Temporary retention duration
not_salable_retention_duration.comment: In hours. Maximum duration: 168 hours (1 week).

shipping_price_based_on.label: Shipping Country
shipping_price_based_on.comment: Default country used to calculate shipping fees

memory_limit.label: Memory limit
memory_limit.comment: in MB. Do not modify if you don't know what you are doing.

execution_time_limit.label: Execution time limit
execution_time_limit.comment: in seconds. Do not modify if you don't know what you are doing.

enable_sync.label: Enable automatic updates ?
enable_sync.comment: Update stocks and prices in real time. This could slow down price and stock modifications.

enable_cron.label: Enable background generation ?
enable_cron.comment: Update feed on background if needed.

use_manage_stock.label: Manage 'Manage stock' attribute ?
use_manage_stock.comment: If yes, products with 'Manage stock' = 'No' will have a stock qty to 100 in the feed.

all_store_products.label: Export products from all stores ?
all_store_products.comment: If any doubt exists, leave it to 'No'

enable_events.label: Enable ShoppingFlux events ?
enable_events.comment: Usefull only in case of specific developments.

manage_configurable.label: Advanced management of configurable products ?
manage_configurable.comment: If no, only configurable products will be transfered (without their children). In most cases, should be set to 'Yes'.

manage_media_gallery.label: Manage product galleries ?
manage_media_gallery.comment: Does not concern main image. Faster if 'No'.

use_shoppingflux_category.label: Use ShoppingFlux category attribute ?
use_shoppingflux_category.comment: Warning : Be sure that this field is set to no before uninstalling the extension.

all_store_categories.label: Use categories from all stores ?
all_store_categories.comment: If any doubt exists, leave it to 'No'

max_category_level.label: Use only X first category levels

sku.label: Product SKU
sku.comment: By default, you need to keep the 'sku' attribute. This value will be used as unique identifier for your products on ShoppingFeed and Marketplaces. Do not change unless shopping feed told you to.
